text:
A Star Is Born was nothing less than a masterpiece. A stellar cast, amazing music, breathtaking performances and impeccable directing – everything about the movie was simply excellent. The movie was not only thought-provoking but also enthralling for fans.
wmagazine.com
Despite five nominations at the Golden Globe, Bradley Cooper's directorial debut only took home one trophy for Best Original Song for Shallow, which was written by Lady Gaga and Mark Ronson. Fans were left disappointed, of course.
pinimg.com
However, now all eyes are glued to the BAFTA Awards, where A Star Is Born has been nominated under seven categories. What’s worth noting down here is that five out of these seven nominations are in the name of Bradley Cooper for best film, actor, best director, adapted screenplay and original music. And this has never happened before.
“What we think is a first is that Bradley Cooper has been nominated for producer, director, writer, actor and composer,” Emma Baehr, BAFTA's director of awards and memberships said.

Bradley Cooper has broken George Clooney's 2005 record where he had received four BAFTA nominations across multiple disciplines including best director, best supporting actor and best screenplay for Good Night, and Good Luck and best supporting actor for Syriana.
With inputs from ANI
